Articles.Content: Man I'm excited for these boats can't wait!
Damn it! It's Saturday now! I can't wait.

Damn it! It's Saturday now! I can't wait.

I know right!

Anyone else got that "12years old on Christmas morning" feeling right now?

BOATSBOATSBOATS!!!!

I got this feeling, ARGH!

InfiniteDice, this waiting KILLS me.
Guys? No release for today?

I'll be releasing today... at some point! I found one issue that needed some code, and another issue that I felt was important to re-balance. I'll need to rebuild the carrier crafts because of this. Just so you're all aware I'm EST New York time. I'll post here when it's ready.
Ok cool, it's gonna be awesome
Heh, I'm still working on my main carrier fighter. I'm guessing R3 will be done before my jet is. I'm not so great at flying planes, even worse at building them lol.
Crap. It's 18:53 in Germany. I won't be able to try it out!
5 AM in New Zealand I might aswell get some rest instead of waiting
19:19. Damn I must wait untill tomorrow. ;(
10:41 for me
half seven, i am going to wait until 3 am if i have to!
ME TOO! I will stay up until it's here!
I am having a hard time making a FAR carrier aircraft, but I finally made a realistic F-14 Tomcat that doesn't handle horribly.

2:08PM for me but then again that is to be expected as Infinite and I live in the same country and have worked on things together. Him mostly on the R3 carrier stuff and me on other projects we have looked into. Just be patient and the addon will be out before you know It! If you are waiting launch a mission to Duna or something and then come back it will probably be out by then.
lol, I've launched about 5 or 6 different satellites into orbit around Mun and Kerbin. XD
He's is online now. Excited!!

Lol the fact Infinite is online means he is probably just checking stuff or just prepping the page for the release. Wow Infinite, I didn't realize when we were looking at things and talking about our plans for this addon that it was going to be this well received even before release.

You guys are acting like a bunch of crack heads who found this, I myself am eager for the R3 parts, but we need to contain our excitement, it's very difficult, I feel you there. We have to try though.
Ok folks have a coke and chill. Go launch a few kerbals for a few and remember the saying around here *soon*

So far here is my best attempt building a main fighter for the carrier. It meets take off and landing requirements, but its rather hard to fly. It has excellent roll authority, but pitch is touchy to say the least. I don't use far...I have enough issues as is lol.

Exactly guys so as I said just keep calm and launch your kerbals while you wait. The uploads are probably going on right now so the addon will probably be out within the next hour. Thanks for your dedication, praise, and your love of our addon it means alot to us that people are waiting to go to bed while waiting for the download to appear.

-InfiniteDice Team
asdfghjkl, oh yea, how fast can the boats go? is there an onboard engine or is it with side attached rockets?

The smaller boats have a built in onboard engine that propells them at quite a fast rate I do not know myself personally as I was not part of the testing crew as I have been busy/working on other projects, but from when Infinite and myself have talked it was going to be something like ~30 m/s or more.

ANY OTHER QUESTIONS THAT PEOPLE HAVE THAT I CAN TRY AND ANSWER WHILE YOU ALL WAIT?

Edited June 15, 2013 by hoodedarche0
